questions: Where can I get the Cash Solution software?
Please provide a link to download the Cash Solution.
Question1.answer: You can download the latest version of Cash Solution from this link: Download Cash Solution.

questions: What should I do if the Cash Solution app is closed or doesn’t open?
Cash Solution shows 'already running' but it's not opening—what to do?
Why does Cash Solution show 'already running' even when it's closed?
How can I check if Cash Solution is running in the background?
Question2.answer:
If the Cash Solution app is not opening and shows 'already running', follow these steps:

1. Check the hidden icons in the taskbar (bottom-right corner of the screen).
2. If you see the Cash Solution icon, right-click it and select 'Exit'.
3. Try reopening the application.

If the icon isn’t visible, follow these steps:

1. Press Ctrl + Shift + Esc to open Task Manager.
2. Look for 'Cash Solution' under the 'Processes' tab.
3. If found, right-click on it and select 'End Task'.
4. Now try opening the app again.

questions: How do I register as a Business Partner with Capricorn CA?
How can I take business partner login?
How can I take Capricorn franchise, to start business with you?
Question6.answer: To register as a Capricorn Business Partner, follow these steps: 1. Visit the official registration page: Register as a Business Partner 2. Select the type of account you want to register. 3. Fill in your personal details – Name, Email, Mobile Number, and Date of Birth. 4. Enter your Address and PIN code. 5. (Optional) Provide your Organization Details – GSTIN and PAN, if applicable. 6. Verify your email through the OTP sent to your inbox. 7. Once verified, your login password will be sent to your registered email. You can then use these credentials to log in and start your journey as a Capricorn Business Partner.

questions: How to receive my commission amount?
How can I claim the commission?
What is the process to get commission?
Question7.answer:
To receive your commission:

1. Verify your bank details and e-sign the agreement.

2. The commission will be credited to your verified bank account between Monday to Friday (working days).

3. If you have a GST number, you must upload an invoice:
   - Go to the 'Account' section and then to the 'Request Money' section.
   - Click on 'Revenue Invoice Format' to download the invoice template.
   - Fill in the details and upload the invoice.

Make sure all steps are completed to ensure timely payment.

Go to the 'Encryption-PFX-Download' section. 3. As per IVG 2.0 guidelines, upload a 30-second video for verification. 4. Urgent download is a paid service. 5. Free processing may take up to 20 days.

questions: Which tokens are compatible for DSC download?
Which token should I purchase to download?
Which tokens can I use to download my DSC?

Question16.answer:
The following updated tokens are compatible for downloading and using your Digital Signature Certificate (DSC):

• Hyper USB Token (Hyper2003)
• WD ProxKey Token
• M-Token

Make sure the token is FIPS-certified and updated with the latest drivers for smooth DSC functionality.

questions: Unable to verify my assistance code due to time expiration. What should I do?
How do I proceed if my assistance code has expired?
Question17.answer: Assistance codes must be updated within 48 hours of downloading the order.

questions: Not receiving OTP for telecom service mobile verification. What should I do?
I’m not receiving the OTP in pan based order for mobile verification, what should I do?
What can I do if the OTP for telecom service verification doesn’t arrive?

questions: How can a mute person complete DSC video verification?
How can a person who is deaf or mute communicate during DSC video verification?
What options are available for a person who cannot speak but needs to verify their identity for DSC?
Question19.answer:
1. Write & Show: The CA executive displays a 3-digit code. You write it on paper and show it in the video.
2. Hand Signs: Use fingers to show the numbers.
3. Aadhaar Option: If possible, use Aadhaar biometric instead of video.

questions: How many days do I have to download my DSC after approval?
Is there a time limit to access or download my DSC after it is approved?
How many days are allowed to download DSC after receiving approval?
Question20.answer:
You have 30 days from the approval date to download your DSC.
After 30 days, you must re-record video to re-verify your identity before downloading.

questions: What does Capricorn identity services company do?
What services are offered by Capricorn Identity Services?
Question21.answer: Capricorn Identity Services Pvt. Ltd. is a Licensed Certifying Authority (CA) approved by India's Controller of Certifying Authorities (CCA). Key Services: 1. Digital Signature Certificates (DSC): - Legally valid for signing documents online (GST filings, tenders, company registrations). - Types: Class 2, Class 3, and Document Signer DSCs. 2. Digital Signing Solutions: - Sign PDFs, contracts, emails securely. - Works for individuals, businesses, and government agencies. 3. PKI & eSigning: - Secure online transactions with Public Key Infrastructure (PKI). 4. Where DSCs Are Used? - Government: GST, Income Tax, MCA filings. - Business: Tenders, banking, foreign trade. - Legal: Document signing, contracts, etc. 5. Why Choose Capricorn? ✔️ CCA-approved ✔️ Fast Aadhaar/Video verification ✔️ 24/7 support Visit: https://www.certificate.digital/

questions: Getting error while processing order Error! Order not allowed for one/all of the details (accompany name, applicant name, email) [RESERVATED LIST].
Why am I receiving the error “error!Order not allowed for one/all of the details (accompany name, applicant name, email) [RESERVED LIST]" while processing my order?
How can I resolve the error stating "Error!Order not allowed for one/all of the details (accompany name, applicant name, email) [RESERVED LIST]"?
Question22.answer: Please check the Gmail/email spelling in the order details and correct it.

questions: How many types of Digital signature certificate (DSC) are there?
How many types of DSCs are officially recognized in India?
What are the different types of Digital Signature Certificates (DSC) used in India?
Digital Signature Certificates are categorized into different classes in India. Can you tell how many main types are officially recognized?
Question23.answer: There are three main types of Digital Signature Certificates (DSCs) in India, as per CCA guidelines: 1. Class 2 DSC (Now merged into Class 3) - Was used for individual identity verification (e.g., ITR filing, company registrations) - Verified identity against a pre-verified database 2. Class 3 DSC - Used for high-security transactions like GST, e-Tendering, MCA filings - Requires FIPS 140-2 certified USB token and video/in-person verification 3. Document Signer Certificate - Issued to organizations (not individuals) - Used for automated document signing - Requires proper authorization from the organization

questions: What is revocation and rejection?
What is the meaning of rejection and revocation?
What is the meaning of revoke and reject order?
Question24.answer: Revocation means cancelling an already issued DSC before its expiry. Once revoked, it cannot be used again. This is a permanent action. Rejection refers to the denial of a DSC application during verification. This happens due to incorrect details, invalid documents, or failed verification. No certificate is issued in this case.

questions: What is the difference between Individual and Organization DSC?
Can you explain the difference between Individual DSC and Org DSC?
Is there any difference between Org DSC and Individual DSC?
Question25.answer: Individual DSC: - Issued in a person's own name - Used for personal purposes like ITR, MCA compliance - Not linked to any organization Organization DSC: - Issued to an authorized signatory of a company, firm, or government body - Used for official purposes (e.g., GST, tenders) - Includes both the individual's and the organization's name on the certificate

questions: I’m getting an error: PAN not linked with DSC on the Income Tax portal.
How do I fix the PAN and DSC linking error on the IT portal?
Getting error: “PAN not linked to DSC” – how to resolve this?
PAN mismatch error with DSC – how can I fix it?
Question26.answer: The error “PAN not linked to DSC” usually occurs when the PAN is not entered correctly or is missing in the application form. To fix this: 1. Log in to the Customer Portal: https://secure.certificate.digital 2. Go to the ‘Form & Agreement’ section. 3. Check the last page of the form and ensure the PAN number is correct. If incorrect or missing, you must create a new DSC with the correct PAN.

questions: While downloading the DSC I got an error “Invalid details provided”.
While downloading my DSC, it says the details are invalid.
Getting an error: “Invalid details provided” while downloading the DSC.
Question27.answer: If you see the error “Invalid details provided” while downloading the DSC, follow these steps: 1. Log in to the customer portal: https://secure.certificate.digital/app/login/?ekyclogin 2. Go to the ‘Download DSC’ section. 3. Double-check all entered details (Order ID, Postal Code, Download Key). 4. Make sure the Download Key is correct and active. Correct any mistakes and try again.

questions: I want to download the DSC, but the Cash Solution is “not responding”.
The Cash Solution app is unresponsive during DSC download.
Cash Solution stuck or frozen – DSC download is not proceeding.
Question28.answer:
If Cash Solution is “not responding” while downloading the DSC, follow these steps:

1. Uninstall all existing token drivers from your system.
2. Reinstall only the correct driver for your specific token (e.g., ProxKey, M-Token, HyperUSB).
3. Once installed, reopen the Cash Solution application.
4. Proceed to download the DSC again.

questions: Getting the error 'eKYC is already used in another eKYC account'. Provide the solution.
Why does it say “eKYC already exists in another account”?
Cannot proceed, showing error — “eKYC already exists in another account” ?
Question29.answer: The error means the eKYC ID you're trying to use is already registered in another account. Solution: - Create a new and unique eKYC ID. - It must be alphanumeric (mix of letters and numbers). - Example: rahul123, client987, etc.

questions: How to enable re-download DSC?
What is the process to enable re-download of DSC?
I'm trying to re-download DSC, but it’s disabled — how do I enable it?
Question30.answer: To enable re-download: 1. Log in to the Customer Portal: https://secure.certificate.digital/ 2. Click on “Re-download” from the menu. 3. Select “Enable Re-download”. 4. Now, you can download the DSC again using the Cash Solution app.

questions: Does Capricorn sell USB tokens?
Can I purchase a USB token from you?
Do I have to order USB tokens in bulk or can I buy just one?
Question31.answer: Yes, Capricorn sells USB tokens — both individually and in bulk. You can purchase as per your need. For pricing and stock, contact: 📧 sales@certificate.digital 📞 01161400000

What should I enter as the password when installing the .pfx certificate?

Question32.answer: The password for the .pfx (encryption certificate) is your Download Key used during DSC download.

questions: How can I check if the token is updated or old?
How do I know whether my DSC token is from the new series or old?
How do I know what series my token belongs to?

questions: The income tax portal shows that PAN and Aadhaar are linked, but in the Order ID it is not updated. How to resolve this?
PAN-Aadhaar link is active, but not reflecting in the DSC order. What can I do?
Income Tax portal shows link done, but it's missing in my DSC order — how do I fix it?
Aadhaar is linked with PAN, but the order still shows it's not updated. How to resolve this?

Log in to the Customer Portal: https://secure.certificate.digital/ 2. Go to the “Action” tab. 3. Remove the existing PAN number. 4. Re-enter the PAN and complete PAN verification again.

questions: Are you there?
Can you help me?
Is anyone here to assist me?
Hello? Are you online?
I need help — can you assist me?
Question37.answer: Absolutely! Let me know what you're looking for—buying a DSC, checking order status, updating details, or anything else. I'm here to help you.

questions: Is it possible to edit my DSC details after download?
Can we modify a DSC order after downloading the certificate?
Question38.answer: No, you cannot modify a DSC after downloading it. Here’s why: Technical Reason: - A DSC is cryptographically issued with fixed details (name, email, PAN, etc.). - Any change requires issuing a completely new certificate. Legal Compliance: - As per CCA guidelines, a DSC is a legally bound digital identity and cannot be altered. What You Can Do Instead: ✔ Submit a fresh DSC application with updated details. ✔ Revoke the old DSC if no longer required.

questions: How to check order status?
Question39.answer: Please log in to your Capricorn Customer Portal using your registered mobile number or email address. Once logged in, navigate to the ‘Action’ tab to view the current order status. (Related to: Capricorn Customer Portal)

questions: How do I purchase a Digital Certificate?
Question40.answer: Please visit this page to buy a digital signature certificate. Select the required product and proceed as per the instructions. (Related to: Buying a Digital Signature Certificate)

questions: I want to purchase DSC for the IREPS portal
Question41.answer:
You need to apply for an Organization-based Signing with Encryption DSC for the IREPS portal.
Apply using: this link (Related to: Purchase Page)
Refer to the detailed guide here: Organization Signatory DSC Guide (PDF)

questions: What type of DSC do I need to purchase for Income Tax filing?
Question42.answer: You need a Class 3 Individual DSC for Income Tax e-filing. Make sure to apply using your PAN details so it functions correctly on the Income Tax portal.

questions: How to use DSC on the Income Tax portal?
Question43.answer: Steps to use DSC on the Income Tax Portal: 1. Register DSC: - Log in to the Income Tax e-Filing Portal - Go to ‘My Profile’ → ‘Register DSC’ - Connect your USB token and select the certificate - Enter password and submit 2. For E-Filing: - While filing, select ‘Sign with DSC’ - Plug in token, choose certificate, and enter PIN/password - Click ‘Sign’ Make sure your Embridge Utility Tool is running: https://embridge.emudhra.com/ (Related to: Embridge Utility Tool)

questions: How to Register DSC on EPFO Portal?
Question44.answer: Steps to register DSC on EPFO Portal: - Visit: https://unifiedportal-emp.epfindia.gov.in/epfo/ - Log in with your credentials - Go to Establishment → e-Sign & DSC Services - Install DSCSigner Utility and ensure your USB token is connected - Enter authorized signatory details, click ‘Register Your DSC’ - Select the certificate and enter token PIN - You will receive a success confirmation After registration, contact EPFO Helpdesk for DSC activation. (Related to: EPFO Employer Portal)

questions: How to use DSC on the GSTIN portal?
Question45.answer: Steps to use DSC on the GST Portal: 1. Download & Install DSC Signer from: https://www.gst.gov.in/help/docsigner 2. Install Java from: https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase-jre8-downloads.html 3. Open https://127.0.0.1:1585 to verify signer is active 4. Login to GST portal: http://www.gst.gov.in Register Your DSC: - Go to My Profile → Register/Update DSC - Connect your token, choose certificate, enter PIN - Submit and proceed with filing using 'Sign with DSC' Ensure DSC is Class 3 and linked with authorized signatory's PAN. (Related to: GST Portal DSC Setup)

questions: I am getting 'Something Went Wrong' error while using DSC on the Income Tax portal. What should I do?
Question46.answer: To resolve the 'Something Went Wrong' error: - Install latest Embridge Utility: https://embridge.emudhra.com/ - Make sure Embridge is running in background - Open: https://localhost.emudhra.com:26769/ in your browser to test - Use a supported browser: Chrome or Firefox (latest versions) Still facing issues? Contact IT DSC Support: 📞 1800 103 0025 📧 efilingwebmanager@incometax.gov.in (Related to: Income Tax Portal DSC Troubleshooting)

questions: What is the process for obtaining a PAN-based DSC?
Question47.answer: To apply for a PAN-based DSC, you will need: - Passport-size photo - PAN card - Aadhaar card or other valid address proof Apply here: https://secure.certificate.digital/buy-digital-signature Follow the steps and upload the required documents. Refer to detailed guide: PAN-based DSC Procedure (PDF) (Related to: PAN-based DSC Application)

questions: What is the process for obtaining a Foreign Individual DSC?
Question48.answer: Required documents for Foreign DSC: - Passport - Address Proof (Utility Bill or Driving License – not older than 3 months) - PAN Card (if DSC is linked with PAN) Apply at Capricorn website. Detailed steps here: Foreign Individual DSC Procedure (PDF) (Related to: Foreign Individual DSC)

questions: What is the process for obtaining an Organization DSC?
Question49.answer: To apply for an Organization DSC, please select your organization type: 1. **Proprietorship**: - Proprietor’s PAN Card / Aadhaar - GST or Registration Certificate (if applicable) - Bank statement (last 3 months) 2. **Private Limited**: - Applicant PAN / Aadhaar - Certificate of Incorporation - Organization PAN - GST Certificate (if applicable) - Board Resolution / Authorization Letter - Bank statement (last 3 months) 3. **NGO/Trust/Society**: - PAN / Aadhaar of signatory - Registration Certificate - GST Certificate (if applicable) - Authorization letter signed by members Apply via: https://secure.certificate.digital/buy-digital-signature Step-by-step guide PDF: Organization DSC Procedure (PDF) (Related to: Organization DSC Application)

questions: How do I apply for a DGFT DSC?
Question50.answer: To apply for a DGFT DSC: **Documents Required:** - IEC Certificate - Authorized Signatory’s PAN & Aadhaar - Organization’s PAN - GST Certificate (if applicable) - Board Resolution / Authorization Letter Apply here: https://secure.certificate.digital/buy-digital-signature Follow the detailed guide: DGFT DSC Guide (PDF) (Related to: DGFT DSC)

questions: How do I apply for a Government DSC?
Question51.answer: A Government DSC is for official use by government employees/departments. **Required Documents:** - Passport-size photo - PAN / Aadhaar of applicant - Authorization Letter on Department Letterhead - Employee ID card (Applicant & Authorizer) - Signature ID of the Authorizer (if not on ID) Apply here: https://secure.certificate.digital/buy-digital-signature Guide: Government DSC Guide (PDF) (Related to: Government DSC)

questions: Which tokens are compatible for DSC download?

You can use any of the following updated tokens:
- Hyper2003
- WD-Proxkey
- M-Token

questions: What documents are required for Organization Authorised Signatory /Employee DSC?

questions: How to update the authorizing person's details in an order?
Question56.answer: Log in to: https://secure.certificate.digital/ Go to the ‘Action’ tab → Click ‘Edit’ → Click ‘Next’ → Update the Authorizing Person's Details accordingly.

questions: How to check the order status in the Business Partner login?

questions: How can I check my commission for a specific product?
Question58.answer: Log in to the Business Partner Portal: https://www.capricornca.com/bp/login/ Navigate to ‘Quick Links’ → Click on ‘Calculator’ to check commission details.

questions: How to settle the stock of the previous login?
Question59.answer: Follow the detailed procedure given in this guide: Stock Settlement Guide (PDF)

questions: Unable to verify my assistance code due to time expiration. What should I do?
Question60.answer: Assistance codes must be verified within 48 hours of order download. If expired, please reinitiate the assistance process with a new code.

questions: Not receiving OTP for telecom service mobile verification. What should I do?
Question61.answer: Please reject the current order and place a fresh Aadhaar-based DSC order for verification.

questions: How to update bank details in the Business Partner profile?
Question62.answer: If your bank details are already verified, please email the updated request to: backoff@capricornid.com

questions: How to receive my commission amount?
Question63.answer: Ensure your bank details are verified and the Agreement is e-signed. The commission will be credited to your verified bank account between Monday to Friday. If you have a GST number, upload an invoice.

questions: The GST of my commission amount hasn’t been received. What should I do?
Commission not received after invoice upload?
Question65.answer: After invoice approval, the amount will be credited within 7 working days. If rejected, check the reason in your Business Partner login dashboard.

questions: Order processed without BP Code. How can I receive my commission?
Question66.answer: Send an email with the Order ID to backoff@capricornid.com.

questions: How to make a DSC payment?
Question67.answer: Log in to the Customer Portal, click on Action > Payment, and complete the payment. The payment option appears after Order Verification.

questions: Can foreign orders be paid in Indian Rupees?
Question68.answer: Yes, after Order Verification, payment can be made in both Dollars and Indian Rupees.

questions: Paid for DSC, but status still shows pending. What should I do?
Question69.answer: Share the Transaction ID and Order ID with backoff@capricornid.com.

questions: Made double payment for one order. How can I get a refund?
Question70.answer: Send screenshots of both payments, the Order ID, and Transaction ID to backoff@capricornid.com.

questions: PAN and Aadhaar are linked on the Income Tax portal, but not updated in the Order ID. What should I do?
Question71.answer: Log in to the Customer Portal, go to Action, remove and re-add the PAN number, then complete the PAN verification again.

questions: Error: 'Certificate not linked with PAN' on the Income Tax portal.
Question72.answer: Ensure the PAN number was entered during the order process by checking the Form & Agreement section in the Customer Portal.

questions: Forgot to download DSC, and now its status is ‘Locked.’ How can I download it?
Question73.answer: If 30 days have passed since order verification, log in to the Customer Portal, click on 'Unlock', complete the video verification again, and once the order is re-verified, you can download the DSC.

questions: Does a Digital Certificate work on a MacBook?
Question74.answer: Yes, a Digital Certificate can work on a MacBook if all DSC requirements are met.

questions: How to change my mobile number in order?
Question75.answer: Mobile number cannot be changed once submitted. Please reject the Order ID and create a new one.

questions: How to update the organization name in the Order ID?
Question76.answer: Log in to the Customer Portal, go to the respective order, click Action > Edit, and modify the organization name.

questions: How to close an eKYC ID?
Question77.answer: Visit: https://www.capricornid.com/close/ — Enter your eKYC ID and PIN, mention the reason, enter the OTP, and submit.

questions: How to re-download DSC?
Question78.answer: Log in to the Customer Portal, click Re-download > Enable Redownload, then download the DSC using Cash Solution.

questions: Where is the .pfx/encryption certificate saved in the system?
Question79.answer: Once downloaded, it is saved in: Documents > Capricorn DSC > Subfolder (Download Date) > OR123XXX.pfx

questions: Are there any job openings?
How can I purchase USB tokens?

questions: Which DSC is required to apply for an IEC certificate?
Question82.answer: Class 3 IET/DGFT-based Signing DSC is required.

questions: Foreign applicants are not receiving OTPs. How to verify mobile numbers?
Question83.answer: Please contact us at +91 95997 18996 from the registered number during working hours (9:30 AM to 6:30 PM IST), or request a callback via SMS or WhatsApp.

questions: Which DSC is required for Income Tax, GST, and ROC (MCA)?
Question84.answer: Class 3 Signing Individual/Organization DSC is required.

questions: What is the difference between an Individual DSC and an Organization DSC?
Question85.answer:
Individual DSC: Used for personal filings & document signing.
Organization DSC: Used by companies for signing & encryption. Required for tender submissions.

questions: How to check if a token is new or old?
Question86.answer: New token series start as follows: - Hyp2003 tokens: Start with ‘HS’ - WDProxkey tokens: Start with ‘WD’ - Mtoken/Crypto tokens: Start with ‘CL’ Refer to: How to identify token series (PDF)

questions: Can Partners have access to the approval system to approve orders themselves?
Question87.answer: No, Capricorn cannot outsource its approval system to any Partners, Resellers, or Associates, as this would be against the CCA guidelines. All approvals must be handled directly by Capricorn CA to ensure compliance.

questions: I have an HYP token, but the token is locked. What can I do?
Question88.answer:
As per CCA guidelines, the only option is token initialization, which deletes the existing certificate.
Contact HYPER Helpline at 0712-6638888 to initiate.
Then log in to the Customer Portal > Re-download > Enable Redownload, and download the DSC via Cash Solution.

questions: I made a payment, but it is still pending. What can I do?
Question89.answer: Send an email with the Order ID and Transaction ID to backoff@capricornid.com.

questions: How to reject the order?
Question90.answer: Log in to https://secure.certificate.digital/, go to the dashboard, click 'Reject', mention the reason, and submit. If the order is already verified, email backoff@capricornid.com with the reason.

questions: Getting error while processing order: Error! Order not allowed for one/all of the details (accompany name, applicant name, email) [RESERVATED LIST].
Question91.answer: Please check the Gmail/email spelling in the order details and correct it.

questions: How to add a partner under my login?
Question92.answer: Log in to https://www.capricornca.com/bp/login/, go to the dashboard under 'Promote DSC Sale', click 'Registration link', and enter your partner’s details. Note: Minimum 20 DSCs must be created and downloaded from your BP login before you get access to this option.

questions: How to revoke DSC?
Question93.answer: Follow the steps in this document: Revocation Guide (PDF)

questions: How can I obtain the old encryption certificate in .pfx format?
Question94.answer: Log in to https://secure.certificate.digital/, select 'Encryption-PFX-Download'. A 30-second video is required as per IVG 2.0. Urgent downloads are paid, otherwise, you must wait for 20 days.

questions: While creating BP under my login, getting error: PAN number already exists. Provide the solution.
Question95.answer:
This means the applicant already has a Capricorn login with that PAN.
If you're a Premium Partner and they want to be under your login, ask them to generate a transfer code from their account and use it to add them.

questions: How to become a premium partner?
Question97.answer: For inquiries regarding Premium Partner registration, please contact your Account Manager or Relationship Manager for further assistance.

questions: Who is my Account Manager and Relationship Manager?
Question98.answer: In your Business Partner profile, go to 'Manage Profile' > 'Support' to view contact details. If not available, email backoff@capricornid.com for assistance.

questions: How can I transfer a partner under my login if I am a Premium Partner?
Question99.answer: Partner must generate a transfer code from their profile: Manage Profile > Settings > Generate Transfer Code. It will be available after 7 days. Then log in to your BP account > Quick Links > Apply Transfer Code. For help, contact your Account Manager or email backoff@capricornid.com.

questions: One of my orders has been verified, now I want to reject it. What can I do?
Question100.answer: Send an email with the Order ID and reason for rejection to backoff@capricornid.com.

questions: While downloading the DSC I get an error: 'Invalid details provided'
Question101.answer: Log in to https://secure.certificate.digital/app/login/?ekyclogin, click 'Download DSC', and verify that all details and the download key are correct and updated.

questions: How to add GST no. in the Business Partner profile?
Question102.answer:
Log in to https://www.capricornca.com/bp/login/, go to 'Profile' > 'Manage Profile' > 'Organisation' > Edit.
If your login is verified, email backoff@capricornid.com to request GST addition.

questions: How to import an encryption DSC into a token?
How to download the DSC?
How to do video verification?
Question105.answer:
Log in to https://secure.certificate.digital, go to the 'Action' tab and select 'Video Verification'.
Alternatively, use the CAPRICORN CUSTOMER app on Android or iOS to record the video.

questions: How to upload documents?
Question106.answer: Log in to https://secure.certificate.digital/app/login/, click on 'Action', and upload the documents as per the required list.

questions: Why is it required to Show Documents in Video while applying with Existing Ekyc?
Question107.answer: As the eKYC validity is extended to 2 years, it is mandatory to show the documents in the video.

questions: How to get the letter format?
Question108.answer: Go to the repository: https://www.certificate.digital/digital-repository/ and check the 'Letter Format' section.

questions: How to track token status?
Question109.answer: The tracking ID is sent to your registered email. Use that ID to check the token status.

questions: How to get the signatory approval for the employee order?
Question110.answer: The authorized signatory must log in to https://secure.certificate.digital/app/login/?ekyclogin, enter eKYC ID and PIN, then go to 'Employee' section to approve.

questions: How to know the earned commission for an order id?
Question111.answer: In your BP login, go to 'Accounts' > 'Earned Revenue' to see commission details for any downloaded order ID.

questions: I want to download the DSC, but the Cash Solution is not responding.
Question112.answer: Uninstall all token drivers from your system, then reinstall only the driver for your token. After that, reopen Cash Solution and download the DSC.

questions: Getting the error 'eKYC is already used in another eKYC account'
Question113.answer: Create a new, unique eKYC ID (must be alphanumeric) — you can use a combination of the client's name and numbers.

questions: An error 'Mobile and email already used by another person' is showing up.
Question114.answer: Log in using the same mobile/email at https://secure.certificate.digital/app/login/. If name mismatch exists, use the same name as shown, or close the eKYC ID to reuse mobile/email.

questions: How to update the download key?
Question115.answer: Log in to https://secure.certificate.digital/app/login/?ekyclogin. Make sure your subscriber agreement is e-signed, then click 'Download DSC' and update your download key.

questions: How to complete e-sign in order status (subscriber agreement)?
Question116.answer: Log in to https://secure.certificate.digital/app/login/?ekyclogin, then click on 'Form and Agreement eSign'.

questions: The provided password of the pfx file does not support it. How to change or modify the password?
Question117.answer: Follow this guide to change the password: https://www.certificate.digital/download/how-to-export-pfx.pdf

questions: Please Share authorization letter format For Government DSC
Question118.answer: Here Below is the Format Of authorization letter of Government Digital signature https://www.certificate.digital/download/govt-authorization-letter.docx

questions: How To Generate Digital signature ?
Question119.answer: Please visit www.certificate.digital > Buy Certificate > Choose your certificate > Then Please Digital signature Please go through this link https://secure.certificate.digital/buy-digital-signature/?_gl=1*1i8w9o0*_gcl_au*OTY4MjY0NDg4LjE3NDA5OTEyMTk.*_ga*MTE2NzQ2MzgxOS4xNzI1MjY3MjQx*_ga_M4XNBSZ6MZ*MTc0NDQ1OTQxNC4xMzEuMC4xNzQ0NDU5NDE0LjYwLjAuMA..

questions: Want to make DSC ?
Question120.answer: Please visit www.certificate.digital > Buy Certificate > Choose your certificate > Then Please Digital signature Please go through this link https://secure.certificate.digital/buy-digital-signature/?_gl=1*1i8w9o0*_gcl_au*OTY4MjY0NDg4LjE3NDA5OTEyMTk.*_ga*MTE2NzQ2MzgxOS4xNzI1MjY3MjQx*_ga_M4XNBSZ6MZ*MTc0NDQ1OTQxNC4xMzEuMC4xNzQ0NDU5NDE0LjYwLjAuMA..

questions: Please share Board of resolution Format
Question121.answer: Here Below is the Format Of Board of Resolution For Digital signature https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PpcHPYYDxtOE2X206_twFdsOe_RCXarN/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=112887707182289304837&rtpof=true&sd=true

questions: How To record video , I did not received any specific link  ?
Question122.answer: Please Login via mobile Or Email in below link https://secure.certificate.digital/app/login/ After Successful Login > Record Tab > You can Record Or make Video There OR You can make video from our application Capricorn Customer Application ( Download from the Play store )

questions: What should I mentioned in Download key option ?
Question123.answer:
Download key must be alphanumeric 
For Example : abc123  

important Note = Download key Minimum length From 5 to maximum 8 Characters.

questions: Payment for Digital signature ?
Question124.answer: Log in to the Customer Portal, click on Action > Payment, and complete the payment. The payment option appears after Order Verification.

questions: How To renew the Digital Signature ?
Question125.answer:
Log in to the Customer Portal via EKYC Option , You will get the renewal tab there . 

You can Renew from There

questions: who are you?
how to apply individual DSC
Question127.answer: click on the given link and select the individual product to create individual digital signature certificate / DSC Apply here: https://secure.certificate.digital/buy-digital-signature

questions: how to do e-sign if payment is clear?
Question128.answer: Answer :Log in to the Customer Portal at https://secure.certificate.digital/app/login/?ekyclogin. Click on "Form and Agreement eSign" to initiate the e-signature process. Enter the eKYC ID and kyc pin to access your account. Click to sign the agreement option Once signed, the agreement will be updated to reflect the e-signature status.
